Articles.Content:
Excuse me if anybody asked this earlier but I was thinking of are you going to do both of the 4 engine and the 5 engine 1st stages or only one of them?

Apparently they have scrapped the 4 engine core and are going with a 5 engine core stage, so Ill be going back to my original 5 engine core, but Ill be including the 4 engine core.

Apparently they have scrapped the 4 engine core and are going with a 5 engine core stage, so Ill be going back to my original 5 engine core, but Ill be including the 4 engine core.

Great. Altough I personally find the 5 engine core looking better but that's just an opinion. Has anyone pm-d you about config editing? I know it's not much but I could help in the balancing part or even make a try on the other parameters as well. I'm not an expert but if it helps I'm in.
The Orion Spacecraft looks great so far! I'm looking forward to it because Bobcat's historic packs are just unrunnable for me (way too memory extensive even to use part of them).
Has this died?

Nope not dead... I am working on all my final projects in school, progress should be ramping back up in the coming weeks. Though I am still looking for someone who has some experience in unity and building config files. So if anyone is interested who has experience please PM me.

Thanks!

Just so you know that I havent abandoned the project. I should have the everything that I have UV'd and ready to texture hopefully by the end of today. and texturing will begin this weekend and hopefully Ill have enough done so I can start animating the video for my final project at school. I have two weeks left of school, so its crunch time! But this mod will be done I apologize for being on hiatus, life happens you know. Anyways still looking for some help with the unity and config files. So please PM me if you are interested.
Great to know that you haven't died! Also, the will be a VIDEO??? Will you let us see it?

Great to know that you haven't died! Also, the will be a VIDEO??? Will you let us see it?

Yeah ill share it once I'm finished. Thanks for your interest.
You're welcome. Looking forward to the end result, I'm sure it will be AWESOME!!!

No, the Block 0 SRBs are actually SSRBs taken straight out of the Shuttle program.

I looked up the data, they are two different SRBs. Similar design, but different all the same. I believe these are the same ones that were going to be used in the original Constellation program, with the Ares 1-X and Ares V. They did build the Ares 1-X, so they are probably using those instead. And before you go and try to say that the Ares 1-X uses space shuttle SRBs as well, the Ares 1-X was built before the shuttle program was cancelled.
Yeah, the Block 0 SRBs are 4-Segments, not 5-Segments, like on the Space Shuttle.
another update
I like how the parachute cover is separate. I can't see the two rear windows on the model. Are you going to include them only on the texture of the pod?
Right now I have 2 windows modeled but I dont like how they turned out and will be remodeling the CM soon, so Im creating some rough textures for it until I can rebuild the model.
Which version did you pick for final texture? The black concept or the original white like in American Pack?
I like the black one so thats the one ill be texturing.
Me too. Do you use Blender to make the models and animations? (Sorry if it was asked before)
I think he said before that he used Maya, which explains why his models look so professional; he IS a professional.

Yup I use maya... but blender is a perfectly capable program! Sorry guys I have nothing to show for my absence my computer decided to crap out on me. So Im way behind on my final projects and am playing catchup as we speak. My computer still isnt acting 100% but it will have to do. So FYI never upgrade several computer components finals week, its a bad idea.

Well sorry to hear about that. I hope you can catch up with all your finals stuff before they crack down on you.

Good luck
What's the multi colored numbers on the models? Normal mapping?

The numbers on the models is when you UV map so you can place textures such as Normal Maps and Texture Maps. They numbered squares are there to give a visual representation so you dont have stretched textures and that you have the same texel density through the entire model.

Is reply with quote not working for anyone else?

The numbers on the models is when you UV map so you can place textures such as Normal Maps and Texture Maps. They numbered squares are there to give a visual representation so you dont have stretched textures and that you have the same texel density through the entire model.

Is reply with quote not working for anyone else?

Same here. I just get an infinite loading symbol. I usually get it working by clicking it again to go to "Advanced Posting Tools".
Doesn't work for me either.

Same here. I just get an infinite loading symbol. I usually get it working by clicking it again to go to "Advanced Posting Tools".

Thats weird, atleast there is a work around!
